SEARCH

Package Services

package Services
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClearRequest
    Creates an instance of a request to clear the database
    ClearResponse
    Represents a response to a request to clear a database
    ClearService
    Implements the logic for an HTTP DELETE method to clear the database
    CreateGameRequest
    Represents a request to create a new game
    CreateGameResponse
    Represents a response to a request to create a new game
    CreateGameService
    Implements the logic for an HTTP POST method to create a new game
    JoinGameRequest
    Represents a request to join a chess game.
    JoinGameResponse
    Represents a request to join a chess game.
    JoinGameService
    Implements the logic for an HTTP PUT method to add a specific color to the game
    ListGamesRequest
    Represents a request to get a list of all games
    ListGamesResponse
    Represents a response to a request for a list of all games.
    ListGamesService
    Implements the logic for an HTTP GET method to get a list of all games
    LoginRequest
    Represents a login request.
    LoginResponse
    Represents a response to a login request to a chess game.
    LoginService
    Implements the logic for an HTTP POST method to log in a specific user
    LogoutRequest
    Represents a request to logout a specific user
    LogoutResponse
    Represents a response to a logout request for a chess game.
    LogoutService
    Implements the logic for an HTTP DELETE method to log out the user represented by the authentication token
    RegisterRequest
    Represents a request to register a user.
    RegisterResponse
    Creates a response to a RegisterRequest.
    RegisterService
    Implements the logic for an HTTP POST method to register a new user
